# s3 - Efficient Yet Effective Search Agent Training via RL ***You Don't Need That Much Data to Train a Search Agent***

**Performance Overview:** ## What is s3?
**s3 Framework**
`s3` is a simple yet powerful framework for training search agents in retrieval-augmented generation (RAG). It teaches language models how to search more effectively‚Äîwithout changing the generator itself. By focusing solely on the search component, `s3` achieves strong performance across QA tasks with just a fraction of the data used by prior methods. It's modular, efficient, and designed to work seamlessly with any black-box LLM. ## Table of Contents - [üì¶ Installation](#-installation) - [üí° Preparation](#-preparation) - [üèãÔ∏è Run Training](https://github.com/pat-jj/s3?tab=readme-ov-file#%EF%B8%8F-run-training) - [üîç Run Search/Retrieval](https://github.com/pat-jj/s3?tab=readme-ov-file#-run-searchretrieval) - [üìà Run Evaluation](#-run-evaluation) ## üì¶ Installation **Searcher & Generator Environment**

**‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏á‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á s3**
`s3` ‡∏Ñ‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≥‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ö‡∏á‡πà‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÅ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏á‡∏û‡∏•‡∏±‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ù‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÅ‡∏ó‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏≤‡πÉ‡∏ô retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ô‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÇ‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏•‡∏†‡∏≤‡∏©‡∏≤‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏≤‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏™‡∏¥‡∏ó‡∏ò‡∏¥‡∏†‡∏≤‡∏û‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡∏∂‡πâ‡∏ô‚Äî‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏á ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏°‡∏∏‡πà‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏â‡∏û‡∏≤‡∏∞‡∏™‡πà‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏≤ `s3` ‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ñ‡∏ó‡∏≥‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏î‡∏µ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô QA ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏®‡∏©‡πÄ‡∏™‡∏µ‡πâ‡∏¢‡∏ß‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ò‡∏µ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤ ‡∏°‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡∏≠‡∏≠‡∏Å‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡πÇ‡∏°‡∏î‡∏π‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏£‡πå ‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏™‡∏¥‡∏ó‡∏ò‡∏¥‡∏†‡∏≤‡∏û ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ñ‡∏ó‡∏≥‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏£‡πà‡∏ß‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö LLM ‡πÉ‡∏î ‡πÜ ‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏£‡πâ‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≠ ## ‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ç - [üì¶ ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏ï‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á](#-installation) - [üí° ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°](#-preparation) - [üèãÔ∏è ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ù‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏°](https://github.com/pat-jj/s3?tab=readme-ov-file#%EF%B8%8F-run-training) - [üîç ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏≤/‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏Ñ‡∏∑‡∏ô](https://github.com/pat-jj/s3?tab=readme-ov-file#-run-searchretrieval) - [üìà ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏¥‡∏ô‡∏ú‡∏•](#-run-evaluation) ## üì¶ ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏ï‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á **‡∏™‡∏†‡∏≤‡∏û‡πÅ‡∏ß‡∏î‡∏•‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Searcher & Generator**

Content:
```bash
conda create -n s3 python=3.9
# install torch [or you can skip this step and let vllm to install the correct version for you]
pip install torch==2.4.0 --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu121
# install vllm
pip3 install vllm==0.6.3 # or you can install 0.5.4, 0.4.2 and 0.3.1
pip3 install ray

# verl
cd code
pip install -e .

# flash attention 2
pip3 install flash-attn --no-build-isolation

# we use pyserini for efficient retrieval and evaluation
pip install pyserini    # the version we used is 0.22.1

# quality of life
pip install wandb IPython matplotlib huggingface_hub
```
Translation:
```bash
conda create -n s3 python=3.9
# install torch [or you can skip this step and let vllm to install the correct version for you]
pip install torch==2.4.0 --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu121
# install vllm
pip3 install vllm==0.6.3 # or you can install 0.5.4, 0.4.2 and 0.3.1
pip3 install ray

# verl
cd code
pip install -e .

# flash attention 2
pip3 install flash-attn --no-build-isolation

# we use pyserini for efficient retrieval and evaluation
pip install pyserini    # the version we used is 0.22.1

# quality of life
pip install wandb IPython matplotlib huggingface_hub
```

Content: **Retriever Environment**

```bash
conda create -n ret python=3.10
conda activate ret

conda install pytorch==2.4.0 torchvision==0.19.0 torchaudio==2.4.0 pytorch-cuda=12.1 -c pytorch -c nvidia
pip install transformers datasets pyserini
conda install -c pytorch -c nvidia faiss-gpu=1.8.0
pip install uvicorn fastapi
```
Translation:
```bash
conda create -n ret python=3.10
conda activate ret

conda install pytorch==2.4.0 torchvision==0.19.0 torchaudio==2.4.0 pytorch-cuda=12.1 -c pytorch -c nvidia
pip install transformers datasets pyserini
conda install -c pytorch -c nvidia faiss-gpu=1.8.0
pip install uvicorn fastapi
```

Content:
## üí° Preparation
***Download Index & Corpus***

```bash
python scripts/download.py --save_path $save_path
cat $save_path/part_* > $save_path/e5_Flat.index
gzip -d $save_path/wiki-18.jsonl.gz
```
***Precompute Na√Øve RAG Initialization***

```bash
# deploy retriever
bash scripts/deploy_retriever/retrieval_launch.sh # or scripts/deploy_retriever/retrieval_launch_mirage.sh for MedCorp corpus.
# deploy generator
bash generator_llms/host.sh # modify tensor-parallel-size to the number of GPUs you use
# run precompute
bash scripts/precompute.sh # this step will take a while, as it will precompute the na√Øve RAG Cache for training
```
Translation:
```bash
# deploy retriever
bash scripts/deploy_retriever/retrieval_launch.sh # or scripts/deploy_retriever/retrieval_launch_mirage.sh for MedCorp corpus.
# deploy generator
bash generator_llms/host.sh # modify tensor-parallel-size to the number of GPUs you use
# run precompute
bash scripts/precompute.sh # this step will take a while, as it will precompute the na√Øve RAG Cache for training
```

## üèãÔ∏è Run Training
***This step is for the training of S3***

RowTranslations.originContent: ***This step is for the training of S3***

Content:
```bash
# deploy retriever
bash scripts/deploy_retriever/retrieval_launch.sh 
# deploy generator
bash generator_llms/host.sh
# run training
bash scripts/train/train_s3.sh
```

```

bash scripts/baselines/deepretrieval.sh # run DeepRetrieval Query Rewriting + Retrieval
```
